name: vezanmatics
subtitle: Animator
quote: Stephan was a real privilege to work with, I had always enjoyed his tracks - I reached out to collaborate on an old portfolio animation of mine called March of Progress, which called for a custom soundtrack with an evolving feel. I eagerly awaited the semi-weekly updates as he worked, he quickly made revisions on request, and the final product surpassed my original expectations. I still listen to it years later!

name: Darren Kerwin
subtitle: Creative Director at Shinesparkers
quote: In 2022 we collaborated on a cover of "Celestial" where I provided vocals for his arrangement. Stephan created an animated video to complement the music where he worked with existing art assets to create a beautiful piece of work. This elevated our project even higher and allowed us to reach a wider audience as a result.

name: Guy Unger
subtitle: Developer at knutsel
quote: I was blown away by Stephan's musical talent when he composed the soundtrack for my game. His cooperation, friendliness and professionalism made working with him a pleasure and the result was a beautiful score that really captures the mood and feel of the game.

name: Bryly Maeder
subtitle: Game Developer of Lightshift
quote: I cannot express enough just how amazing this creator is! Stephan has produced many wonderful creations over the years, and as a long time fan of his music, I commissioned some of his work for my game. His music was stunning and so much more than I bargained for. Not only is he easy to work with but such a friendly guy who gets things done in a reasonable time.

name: Pierre Bonis
subtitle: Senior Games Programmer at Meta
quote: Working with Stephan was always such a great pleasure. His minute attention to detail and love of clean, well-documented code made for one of the smoothest collaborative experiences I've had in a community project. He's organised, focused but knows how to improvise and compromise. Oh, and he's also friendly, knowledgeable and approachable. The whole package!

quote: The music and video editing from Stephan are on a very high level. You can see and hear the passion and all the hard work he puts into it!

name: Irene Emory
subtitle: Lead Business Analyst at EPAM
quote: I cannot express enough how the project and team benefit from having Stephan working with us. He seems to genuinely care about the quality of the product. I don't remember his scope of work ever causing any major or medium bugs, only minor ones or none at all. He has great organizational and explanatory skills. His general demeanor uplifts the team spirit.
